constituent: frozen, ice, east, tree, wood, sun, day
heisigStory: The whole secret to breaking the ice with the East is to peek behind those mysteriously "frozen smiles."
koohiiStory1: Eastern Siberia is often frozen by ice. According to wikipedia, Yakutia (in Eastern Siberia) holds the record as the coldest town on Earth. Check it out yourself...it made it stick for me!
koohiiStory2: The ice will stay frozen until the sun is visible through the trees.
kunYomi: こお.る、こご.える、こご.る、い.てる、し.みる
myStory: đóng băng. người tuyết. mưa phía đông có tuyết
readingExamples: 凍る (こお.る), 凍える (こご.える)
